snippet.title: Coming to Steam... Will You Go Deep? Or Will You Go Home?
snippet.description:
Go Deep Or Go Home is still in development. I intend to release a demo for the game on Steam in the upcoming months. Please Wishlist the game on Steam for updates and notifications, and don't forget to "Like" and "Subscribe". Thanks for watching!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2550910/Go_Deep_Or_Go_Home/

Oh! In case you're wondering about the music track for this video... It's just some shred guitar stuff that I recorded at home a long time ago and threw online. I named the track "A Product of Boredom". You can find this song and other snippets of music I created over the years on my SoundCloud page.

https://soundcloud.com/billy-mcdaniel

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/almightyassets
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/almightygamesdev
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_almightygames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/almightygames.dev/

PUBLISHED GAMES

Hail To The King:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/998730/Hail_To_The_King/
Bully Beatdown:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/793600/Bully_Beatdown/
Save Jesus:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/509220/Save_Jesus/
Zombie Ballz:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/581970/Zombie_Ballz/

PUBLISHED COURSES

Learn Blender 3D Modeling for Unity Video Game Development:
https://www.udemy.com/learn-blender-3d-modeling-for-unity-video-game-development/?couponCode=YTDISCOUNT
Learn UV Unwrapping with Blender for Unity 3D Game Design:
https://www.udemy.com/learn-uv-unwrapping-with-blender-for-unity-3d-game-design/?couponCode=YTDISCOUNT
Low-poly Vehicle Design in Blender for Unity Game Developers:
https://www.udemy.com/low-poly-vehicle-design-in-blender-for-unity-game-developers/?couponCode=YTDISCOUNT
Blender for Unity Interior Only Modular Dungeon Level Design:
https://www.udemy.com/blender-for-unity-interior-only-modular-dungeon-level-design/?couponCode=YTDISCOUNT
